channel.title: Donator system help
channel.description: On many servers i been seeing some one speak and right before there name they have a money icon to show they are a donator..I was wondering how i put that in my client/server i got a 317.

item.title: Donator system help
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“Skiire, post:5, topic:443080”][quote author=MrFun link=topic=545769.msg4000695#msg4000695 date=1337950320]

If you’re loading your crowns through the cache, like you’re supposed too, you’ll need tom’s cache suite. Add a new MODICON_## and create a new player-rank both client and server sided.

TIP: (Assuming you’re using galkons refactored) cr1, playerRank, && server-sided will depend on the base.

There should actually be a guide on this too (google: player rank guide server_base_name_here).

I’m using this base


[/quote]

I would like to think of myself as decent at identifying which base, but I can’t do so from the few java files you showed in the video and I can’t see the folder tree (packaging) on the video because it’s too small so I can’t even make an educated guess. All I’m saying is “Blank Client” with a the ton of cache edits the creator did would leave me to believe it’s not blank, same with the source if it’s from the same author.[/quote]
well you can download the client and source form the vid link and the cache is f up it only has 1 of the godswords and the dark bow model is f’ed up

Read full topic

item.title: Donator system help
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“MrFun, post:4, topic:443080”][quote author=Skiire link=topic=545769.msg4000668#msg4000668 date=1337944765]
If you’re loading your crowns through the cache, like you’re supposed too, you’ll need tom’s cache suite. Add a new MODICON_## and create a new player-rank both client and server sided.

TIP: (Assuming you’re using galkons refactored) cr1, playerRank, && server-sided will depend on the base.

There should actually be a guide on this too (google: player rank guide server_base_name_here).
[/quote]
I’m using this base

I would like to think of myself as decent at identifying which base, but I can’t do so from the few java files you showed in the video and I can’t see the folder tree (packaging) on the video because it’s too small so I can’t even make an educated guess. All I’m saying is “Blank Client” with a the ton of cache edits the creator did would leave me to believe it’s not blank, same with the source if it’s from the same author.

Read full topic
